item.title: RBC Capital Markets upgrades this solar stock to outperform following tax credit clarification
item.description: RBC Capital Markets believes that Sunrun's cash generation in 2026 could climb to $550 million from $308 million in 2025.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these three stocks for attractive growth potential
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three stocks, including Pinterest and CoreWeave.

item.title: Amazon's expansion of grocery delivery isn't the death knell for these stocks. Here's why
item.description: Amazon on Wednesday announced plans to expand its same-day grocery delivery include perishable items like meat and dairy in more than 1,000 cities.

item.title: Earnings playbook: Retail takes center stage with Walmart and Target set to report
item.description: We're at the tail-end of the earnings season, but there are some major retailers still left to report this week.

item.title: Market concentration around AI darlings persists. It's making investors worried
item.description: Investors worry that a stock market priced for perfection is vulnerable to some sort of setback.
